text:
Hello!
I'm working on a custom drag and drop theme, using section templates. Is there any way to set some CSS rules only when I use a specific section template on a page?

Section templates support <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/templates/drag-and-drop-areas/sections#section-classes|adding classes via the >`class`<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/templates/drag-and-drop-areas/sections#section-classes| property>. Is that what you’re looking for?
